suppliers.name: Artcraft
suppliers.description: A Canadian/American company providing lighting products that cater to your lifestyle, budget, and individual taste.

suppliers.name: Avista
suppliers.description: A Canadian company specializing in chrome & crystal fixtures, with modern LED looks.

suppliers.name: Canarm
suppliers.description: Canarm Lighting supplies quality, on-trend products that are both affordable and obtainable.

suppliers.name: Capital
suppliers.description: Capital Lighting prides themselves on delivering stylish, high quality products at affordable prices, from interior to exterior.

suppliers.name: Dals
suppliers.description: Offering recessed, cabinet, accent, and architectural LED lighting. Based out of Quebec.

suppliers.name: DVI
suppliers.description: Design, value, and inventory are the principles DVI has branded itself upon. Keeping a strong commitment to fresh product lines in fashion – offering pricing families can afford.

suppliers.name: Eurofase
suppliers.description: Eurofase provides a diverse selection of high quality, innovative lighting. Statement chandeliers, alluring pendants, vanity & bath lights, track & recessed lighting, exterior fixtures, cabinet & display lighting, plus LED mirrors.

suppliers.name: Galaxy
suppliers.description: Galaxy Lighting provides some of the most unique lighting fixtures available on the market. You will find a wide selection of interior and exterior lighting, ranging from pendants & chandeliers to recessed lighting, from wall sconces & floor lamps to vanity lights.

suppliers.name: Generation
suppliers.description: Superior quality – delivering a balanced range of price points and styles, maintaining the highest standards with materials and workmanship.

suppliers.name: Hinkley
suppliers.description: Thoughtful design, impeccable attention to detail, and quality craftmanship are the backbone of every single product released by Hinkley Lighting and Fredrick Ramond.

suppliers.name: Kendal
suppliers.description: Kendal Lighting quality and design can be found in many areas of Lighting including Fans, Fixtures, Lamps, Track Lighting, and Rail Systems.

suppliers.name: Kichler
suppliers.description: Kichler Lighting offers a variety of lighting solutions and ceiling fans to match your unique style and personality, while focusing on detail & quality.

suppliers.name: Korson
suppliers.description: Korson Furniture Design designs, customizes, imports, and distributes contract quality home furnishings to top tier and mid-level furniture retailers and interior designers across Canada. Korson’s occasional furniture and accents are inspired by the ultimate in quality furniture fashioned from Milan, Toronto, and other international markets.

suppliers.name: LuceLumen
suppliers.description: Luce Lumen’s product line offers unparalleled style that will impress even the most discerning audience and suit an array of sophisticated décor styles.

suppliers.name: MonteCarlo
suppliers.description: Monte Carlo is a Fan company that specializes in trend-inspired, fashion-forward ceiling fans in a wide variety of models, sizes, and finishes for any interior space. Rooms come alive with style, all with premium grade motors and features.

suppliers.name: Satco-Nuvo
suppliers.description: Satco|Nuvo is a leading manufacturer of lighting solutions including bulbs, decorative lighting, functional and task lighting, as well as lighting components.

suppliers.name: Snoc
suppliers.description: Snoc is a true manufacturing company, supplying a myriad of customizable exterior lighting solutions, as well as mailboxes & house numbers. Everything – design, production, and shipping – is done inside the same building. The company therefore enjoys a great deal of autonomy and complete control over the quality of its products.

suppliers.name: Starfire
suppliers.description: Starfire Crystal is a leading manufacturer and importer of fine crystal chandeliers & other lighting that reflect the latest innovations and trends in the lighting industry.

suppliers.name: Sunpan
suppliers.description: Sunpan is a fast-growing global furniture company specializing in the design and manufacturing of transitional and contemporary furnishings.

suppliers.name: Tech
suppliers.description: For 25 years, Tech Lighting has been an industry leader in low-voltage lighting systems and contemporary decorative fixtures.

suppliers.name: Worldwide
suppliers.description: From dining sets, bedrooms, and coffee tables, to decadent ottomans, benches, and chairs, Worldwide Home Furnishings offer striking products without compromising quality or price.

suppliers.name: Kandil Canada
suppliers.description: Kandil is a high-end lighting distributor and a unique custom-made lighting manufacturer, with offices in four different countries.
